page.title: 08PUBLIC TRANSPORT
page.content:
Our D-Block is served by Rossendale
Borough Council buses mostly. There is a good, regular service which runs from Rawtenstall to Bacup, passing through Stacksteads. If you want to go out of the valley there are buses from Bacup to Burnley and to Rochdale. If you go to Rawtenstall you can catch buses to Bury, Bolton and Manchester. There used to be a railway between Rawtenstall and Bacup and there was a station at Stacksteads. It was used mostly by people going to work or children going to school, but it closed about 20 years ago. You can still see where the tracks were and there are still bridges. If you go through the glen you can see the old tunnels which are now used by the Council to store salt and grit for the roads in winter.
